Source: DOJ OIG photographs and DOJ OIG schematic drawing depicting the MCC New York SHU

additional_notes: The document appears to be a page from a report or inspection document related to a correctional facility, specifically the Special Housing Unit (SHU) at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York. The page includes photographs and a schematic drawing. One of the photographs has been modified for security reasons.
